dict.acceptation: 聪明的，灵巧的；英俊的，风采优雅的；性情温良的；油腔滑调的；

sent.orig: The clever man are not so nice and somewhat handsome don't think we are clever enough.
sent.trans: 不是很好但是很帅又很聪明的男人却嫌我们不够聪明。

sent.orig: She is very clever, too clever for a woman. She lacks the indefinable charm of weakness.
sent.trans: 她非常聪明，作为一个女人她过于聪明了。她缺少柔弱这一难以言喻的魅力。

sent.orig: The clever women are not so nice somewhat beautiful don't think are clever enough.
sent.trans: 不是很好很漂亮又很聪明的女人却嫌不够聪明。

sent.orig: She's clever, but her elder brother is not as clever.
sent.trans: 她很聪明，但她哥哥没有她聪明。

sent.orig: He is a very clever politician, Too clever by half, in my opinion.
sent.trans: 他是一位十分精明的政客。不过在我看来，他未免过于精明。
